pages.text: Gyracanthides is an acanthodian with a long pectoral spine. It was dorsoventrally flat and had a laterally compressed caudal fin. Its scales were thin and slightly concave and it had a pair of spines on its fins.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
